logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: * Hacked around the "file:/" vs "file://" problem * Added some code to make sure the stage variable now actually returns the stage. This is done by taking the request URI and using some blatant assumptions (i.e. the URI is of the form /context-prefix/publication-id/stage) to extract the stage.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The sampleResourceName can now be specified in the doctypes resource file as <sample-name> element which is a child of the creator element. So the constructor in NewArticleCreator is not needed anymore, actually the whole class isn't needed anymore since it consists of nothing but a constructor.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The sampleResourceName can now be specified in the doctypes resource file as <sample-name> element which is a child of the creator element. So the constructor in NewArticleCreator is gone (the whole class isn't needed anymore since it consists of nothing but a constructor) and a sample-name element is added to doctypes.xconf for each doctype.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: using separate pipeline for http request

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The sampleResourceName can now be specified in the doctypes resource file as <sample-name> element which is a child of the creator element. So the constructor in CMFProjectCreator, CMSProjectCreator and EditorProjectCreatoris gone and a sample-name element is added to doctypes.xconf for each doctype.

logentry.msg: Added a logger to parent-child action.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The sampleResourceName can now be specified in the doctypes resource file as <sample-name> element which is a child of the creator element. So the constructor in NewArticleCreator is gone and a sample-name element is added to doctypes.xconf.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The sampleResourceName can now be specified in the doctypes resource file as <sample-name> element which is a child of the creator element. So the constructor in ArticleCreator is gone and a sample-name element is added to doctypes.xconf.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The DefaultCreator is now invoked properly from the ParentChildCreatorAction, i.e. the configuration is parsed from the doctypes file and passed to the Creator.
